analysis.description:
TokenTimelock.lock (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#77-95) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(balance == totalFutureRelease)

Reentrancy in TokenTimelock.lock (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#77-95):
	External calls:
	- balance = cosTokenApi.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#87-89)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockStart (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#94)

Reentrancy in TokenTimelock.release_specific (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#99-121):
	External calls:
	- balance = cosTokenApi.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#107-108)
	- success = contract_addr.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),benificiary,eachRelease) (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#114-119)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- release_map (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#120-121)

Reentrancy in TokenTimelock.lock (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#77-95):
	External calls:
	- balance = cosTokenApi.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#87-89)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- startTime (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#90-93)

TokenTimelock.dayFor (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#138-144) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timestamp < startTime (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#142-144)
Parameter '' of RegisterInterface.register (/unique_chucks/34/0x275a0c5744894b756bd2cca32f831befd46487b1.sol#8-9) is not in mixedCase
